#id=1
#text=Yesterday I decided I needed to get to the grocery bus .
#id=2
#text=My car had a flat tire , so I decided to ride the public bus .
#id=3
#text=First , I went online to see the map of the public bus ' because it overwhelms me and I am afraid I will get lost .
#id=4
#text=Then I called the bus hotline and asked the operator how to get where I wanted to go .
#id=5
#text=He helped me figure out what buses I need to take where .
#id=6
#text=Then , I had some lunch , took my backpack and left the house .
#id=7
#text=I had to walk to the bus stop .
#id=8
#text=On the way , I could smell the exhaust from the cars and I already started freaking out .
#id=9
#text=The exhaust is really unhealthy for you .
#text=Then I waited for the bus at the stop .
#text=After 20 minutes , the bus I needed finally came .
#text=The bus came to stop , the doors opened .
#text=I stepped onto the bus and gave the driver my money .
